fieldUpdates.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK( Services_Expiration_2__c ), ISNULL(Services_Expiration_2__c)) , Services_Expiration_1__c , IF(Services_Expiration_2__c > Services_Expiration_1__c, Services_Expiration_2__c, Services_Expiration_1__c) )
fieldUpdates.name: Populate Services Expiration on Case
Set Rev Rec Date to Exp Completion Date

fieldUpdates.description: Set Rev Rec Date to Today
fieldUpdates.name: Set Rev Rec Date to Today

fieldUpdates.name: Update Case Owner for Intapp Prime

fieldUpdates.description: Update the 'Project - Est. Compl Date - Prior' field with the previous value when the main field changes.

rules.description: Rule Code: CASE-001xFxx Populate CRD Email Populates CRD Email on Case object
Rule Code: CASE-002Exxx Support Case Escalated to CRM Sends an email alert whenever a support case is escalated to CRM
Rule Code: CASE-003Exxx RMA Case is created Alert the account owner that an RMA case has been created
Rule Code: CASE-004Exxx Survey Received Sends an email notification on case Closing Survey via Web to Case
Rule Code: CASE-005Exxx Feature Request Received - Time Sends an email notificaton when Feature Request for the Time Practice Received
Rule Code: CASE-006Exxx Feature Request Received - Risk Sends an email notification when Feature Request for the Risk Practice Received
Rule Code: CASE-007Exxx Feature Request Received - Integration Sends an email notification when Feature Request for the Integration Practice Received
Rule Code: CASE-008Exxx Feature Request Received - Unknown Product Sends an email notification when Feature Request for Unknown Product Received - Send to all practices
Rule Code: CASE-009Exxx Notice When Account is Removed from Hot List Notice to Customer Success, Professional Services, Practice Group Leaders, COO, CEO when account is removed from Hot List.
Rule Code: CASE-010Exxx Notice When Account is Added to Hot List Notice to Customer Success, Professional Services, Practice Group Leaders, COO, CEO when account is added to Hot List.
Rule Code: CASE-011ExxT Support: Case Owner Changed This rule looks for when the owner of a Support case is changed.

Rule Code: CASE-012Exxx SFDC Change Request: Case Created Sends an email to Carolina, Role: Operations, the contact, and the last modified by user whenever a case has a record type of Internal - Operations Change Request
Rule Code: CASE-013Exxx SFDC Change Request Closed Sends an email notification to Carolina and the Contact whenever a case status changes to Closed - Resolved or Closed - Unresolved
Rule Code: CASE-014xFxx NewPortalCase Updates the Case: Case Owner field when a new portal case is generated.
rules.formula: and( OR( ispickval(Origin,"Customer Portal"), ispickval(Origin,"Customer Community"), ispickval(Origin,"Email2Case") ), ispickval(Status,"New"), RecordType.Name = "Support" )

rules.description: Rule Code: CASE-015Exxx Support: Case Closed This rule looks for when a Support case is closed.
rules.formula: Record_Type_Name__c = "Support" && NOT(ISNEW()) && NOT(RecordTypeId="0123000000008KH") && ISCHANGED(IsClosed) = True && IsClosed = True && $User.ProfileId != '00e50000001Bf1Z' && Internal_Cloud_Case__c=FALSE &&NOT(CONTAINS(Subject, "[Email Loop Protection]")) &&$User.Id<>"00550000004PGDf" /*Maiya Hilliard*/

rules.description: Rule Code: CASE-016EFxx Send Support Survey Sends support survey with email notificaiton to designated contact. Also checks the SupportSurveySent checkbox.
rules.formula: AND(IsClosed=True, (Send_Support_Survey__c=True), (SupportSurveySent__c=False), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed - Resolved"), $User.ProfileId != '00e50000001Bf1Z', NOT(CONTAINS(Subject, "[Email Loop Protection]")) )

rules.description: Rule Code: CASE-017xFxx NewPortalCaseLegalKey Updates the Case: Case Owner field whenever a new LegalKey customer portal case is created. The field is updated to Dmitriy Galkovsky
Rule Code: CASE-018xxOx UpdateCaseInDTE Sends out an outbound message to update Case in DTE
rules.formula: ISNEW() || ( (ISCHANGED(AccountId) || ISCHANGED(Date_Closed__c) || ISCHANGED(IsClosed) || ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) || ISCHANGED(Status) || ISCHANGED(Subject)) && (Record_Type_Name__c <> 'Support Survey' && Record_Type_Name__c <> 'Survey' && Record_Type_Name__c <> 'FRU' && Record_Type_Name__c <> 'Procurement' && LEFT(Record_Type_Name__c, 14) <> 'Implementation'))

rules.booleanFilter: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8

criteriaItems.value: Error: Object reference not set to an instance of an object
Error: Exception of type 'System.OutOfMemoryException' was thrown
Error: Attempted to read or write protected memory
Error: A generic error occurred in GDI+
Error: Cannot access a disposed object
Error: Invoke or BeginInvoke cannot be called on a control until the window handle
Error: Index was out of range

rules.description: Rule Code: CASE-019xFxx Assign Cases to Unidentified SC-000048 Assigns cases to the unidentified queue; this is due to the fact that these cases are being generated by automatic error messages from the appliance and are cluttering the SFDC queue.
Rule Code: CASE-020Exxx Case Verified Crtitical Sends and email notification whenever a case has been marked as "Verified Critical"
Rule Code: CASE-021Exxx Critical Support Case Assigned Sends an email notification when a Critical case is assigned to a CSE.
Rule Code: CASE-022Exxx Critical Support Case Submitted Sends an email notification when a Critical case is submitted to the Customer Portal.
Rule Code: CASE-023Exxx Critical Support VM Received Sends an email notification when a Critical case (Voicemail) is received from the Customer.
Rule Code: CASE-024EFxx Intapp Prime Service Request Sends an email notification and update Status, Owner when Intapp Prime check box is checked
Rule Code: CASE-025xFxx Populate Account Owner Email Populates Account Owner Email on new case creation
Rule Code: CASE-026xFxx Populate Date Defect Filed Populates Date Defect Field when Status is set to "Defect Filed"
Rule Code: CASE-027xFxx Populate Engagement Manager Email Populates the contact email address(Engagement manager Email field) when Engagement Manager is filled
Rule Code: CASE-028Exxx Project Escalation Case Closed Sends an email notification when a Project Escalation Case type has been closed
Rule Code: CASE-029Exxx Project Escalation Case Comment Generated Sends an email notification whenever there is a new case comment on Project Escalation Cases
Rule Code: CASE-030Exxx Project Escalation Case Created Sends an email notification when a Project Escalation Case has been created
Rule Code: CASE-031Exxx Support Case Assigned Sends an email notification when a case is assigned to a CSE.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( OwnerId ), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Priority, "Critical")), NOT(CONTAINS(Subject, "[Email Loop Protection]")) )

rules.description: Rule Code: CASE-032xFxx Update Survey Engineer Score if Blank Updates the Survey Engineer Score to a 10 if it is left blank
Rule Code: CASE-033xFxx Update Survey Overall Score if Blank Updates the Survey Overall Score to a 10 if it is left blank
Rule Code: CASE-034xFxx Update Survey Product Score if Blank Updates the Survey Product Score to a 10 if it is left blank
Rule Code: CASE-035xxxx Case Escalated to CRM Sends an email alert to the CRD whenever a support case is escalated to CRM
Rule Code: CASE-036xxxx Implementation Case Closing Notification People are notified when a case is closed.
Rule Code: CASE-037xxxx Handle incoming Time Builder feedback emails
Rule Code: CASE-038Exxx Case Est. Completion Date Changed Monitors when the Estimated Completion Date field changes on a Professional Services case. Sends the email alert.
rules.formula: AND ( IsClosed = FALSE, ISCHANGED(PSCase_Project_Exp_Compl_Date__c), NOT(ISNEW()), BEGINS(Record_Type_Name__c, "Implementation"), NOT( Services_Revenue_Total__c = 0 ), NOT( AND( YEAR( PSCase_Project_Exp_Compl_Date__c ) = YEAR( Project_Exp_Compl_Date_Prior__c ), MONTH( PSCase_Project_Exp_Compl_Date__c ) = MONTH( Project_Exp_Compl_Date_Prior__c ) ) ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: CASE-039Exxx Case Confidence in Competion Date Changed Monitors when the Confidence in Completion Date field changes on a Professional Services case.
Rule Code: CASE-040xFxx Populate Services Expiration
Rule Code: CASE-041xFxx PS Case Rev Rec Date Today When a case is closed and the delay flag isn't checked, set revenue recognition date to today.
Rule Code: CASE-042xFxx Update Rev Rec Date When Rev Rec flag is unchecked and expected completion date is changed, update the rev rec date.
rules.formula: Revenue_Recognition_Delay__c = FALSE && IsClosed = FALSE && PSCase_Project_Exp_Compl_Date__c <> Project_Exp_Compl_Date_Prior__c

rules.description: Rule Code: CASE-043Exxx Revenue Recognition Notification Alert that gets emailed out to verify that revenue can actually be recognized.
Rule Code: CASE-044Exxx Implementation Case Creation Notification

criteriaItems.value: Implementation - Activity Tracker,Implementation - Time Builder,Implementation - Wall Builder,Implementation - CID,Implementation - Time Builder Pilot & Rollout,Implementation - Generic

rules.description: Rule Code: CASE-045Exxx SE Case Assignment Notification
Rule Code: CASE-046Exxx 7 Day Revenue Recognition Notification Alert that gets emailed out a week in advance to verify that revenue can actually be recognized.
Rule Code: CASE-047Exxx SFDC Change Request: Date Changed
rules.formula: AND( Record_Type_Name__c = "Internal - Operations Change Request", IsClosed = FALSE, NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(Date_Closed__c) )

rules.description: Rule Code: CASE-048xxxx Send Case Created Email to Implementation Expert Team
Rule Code: CASE-049xFxx NewPortalCaseFromPartner Updates the Case: Case Owner field whenever a new portal case from a partner is generated. Field is updated to Mikhail Mudryy.
Rule Code: CASE-050xxxx Populate Contact Email Populates the contact email address
Rule Code: CASE-051xxxx Populate Dedicated Support Engineer Populate Dedicated Support Engineer
Rule Code: CASE-052xFxx Update Survey Project Manager Score if Blank Updates the Survey Project Manager to a 10 if it is left blank
Rule Code: CASE-053EFxx Intapp Prime Service Request Intapp Prime Service Request Workflow to Update Status, Owner and Send Notification

tasks.subject: Email: Client Notified of Case Ownership Change
